    • Method Detail

      • cancelMove

        public boolean cancelMove()
        Description copied from class: SimpleObject
        Cancel the objects movement. This can be used after calling move to undo the move. The following code demonstrates how it can be used to make a collision with a SimpleSolid and a SimpleObject seem like a SimpleSolid-SimpleSolid collision: 
         
        public class yourClass extends SimpleObject
        {
 
                public void collision(SimpleObject s){
                        switch(s.getID()){ //s must also be a SimpleSolid
                                case 0:
                                //Assuming s was not moving, move back to the place before the collision occurred.
                                cancelMove();
                                break;
                        }
                }
                
                ... Other methods ...
        }
        Overrides:
        cancelMove in class SimpleObject
        Returns:
        True iff the move was undone.

      • move

        public boolean move(int x,
           int y,
           boolean relative)
        Description copied from class: SimpleObject
        Move to a pixel coordinate (x,y) or move relatively from the current coordinate (coor_x + x, coor_y + y). When requesting to move further than the boundary of the map, this method will attempt to move the object as much as possible within the boundary.
        Overrides:
        move in class SimpleObject
        Parameters:
        x - New x -coordinate.
        y - New y-coordinate.
        relative - True if the object should move relative to its coordinates: (coor_x + x, coor_y + y).
        Returns:
        True if movement (not necessarily the movement asked for) happens.

      • getSolid

        public SimpleSolid getSolid()
        Description copied from class: SimpleObject
        If this object is a solid, return itself. Else return null.
        Overrides:
        getSolid in class SimpleObject
        Returns:
        null iff this object is not Solid.
